title: Meet RealSoftHouse
description: A professional, self-hosted real-time video conferencing solution built for high-fidelity audio/video communication with cross-platform support (Web & Mobile), screen sharing, session recording, and virtual backgrounds.
summary: A production-ready video conferencing platform featuring HD adaptive streaming, cross-platform support (web & mobile apps), screen sharing, virtual backgrounds, session recording via LiveKit Egress, and smart permission handling. Built with microservices architecture using Docker Compose, with separate containers for frontend, API, media server, egress, and Caddy reverse proxy with automatic HTTPS.

title: AirAware
description: A comprehensive air quality monitoring platform that helps users track and analyze air pollution data with real-time updates and AI-powered insights.
summary: A comprehensive air quality monitoring platform with IoT integration, AI-powered predictions, and real-time alerts. Features secure authentication, sensor data management, machine learning forecasts, and MQTT notifications for communities and environmental agencies.

title: Error20
description: A cross-platform coding challenge and learning platform available on web and mobile, helping developers improve their programming skills.
summary: A bilingual (Arabic/English) platform helping young adults navigate quarter-life crisis with educational resources, self-assessment tools, workshops, and community support. Available on both web and mobile with modern UI and performance optimization.

title: AI Text Detector
description: An intelligent tool that detects AI-generated text with high accuracy, available as both a web app and npm package for developers.
summary: Advanced AI text detection tool using sophisticated linguistic analysis, perplexity scoring, and neural pattern recognition. Available as both web app and NPM package with zero dependencies, supporting multiple AI models and providing detailed confidence metrics.

title: RCsandwitch
description: An innovative food ordering platform with modern UI/UX design, providing seamless online ordering experience for restaurants and customers.
summary: A modern food ordering platform featuring intuitive customer interface, comprehensive admin dashboard, real-time order tracking, and secure authentication. Streamlines restaurant operations with order management, inventory tracking, and mobile-responsive design.

title: Pinterest Clone
description: A fully functional Pinterest clone with image uploading, board creation, and social features built with modern React architecture.
summary: Complete Pinterest clone with image uploading, board creation, user authentication, and social features. Built with modern React architecture featuring responsive grid layout, search functionality, and intuitive user interface.

title: Local Coding Exam System
description: A secure local examination system for coding assessments, ensuring fair evaluation in educational institutions.
summary: Lightweight offline SQL exam system with server-side timer, syntax highlighting, automatic submissions, and IP tracking. Features exam management, student monitoring, grading system, and cross-platform support for secure educational assessments.

title: C++ Python Translator
description: An intelligent code translator that converts C++ code to Python, helping developers migrate and learn between programming languages.
summary: Educational code translator converting C++ control structures (loops, conditionals, assignments) to Python syntax. Features web interface, real-time processing, and file-based translation system for learning language syntax differences.

title: Student ID Card Dashboard
description: A comprehensive dashboard for managing student ID cards at Helwan University with modern design and efficient data management.
summary: Comprehensive university ID card management system with student information management, card design tools, photo upload, batch processing, and administrative controls. Features modern dashboard interface and data export capabilities.

title: Student Interview Platform
description: A digital platform for conducting student interviews and assessments at Helwan University with streamlined evaluation processes.
summary: Digital platform for university student interviews and assessments with scheduling management, evaluation forms, progress tracking, standardized scoring, and comprehensive reporting for streamlined academic evaluation processes.

title: Student Admission System
description: A comprehensive student admission management system for Helwan University with automated processing and tracking capabilities.
summary: Comprehensive university admission management system with automated workflows, document verification, merit-based ranking, multi-stage processing, and analytics. Streamlines the entire admission process from application to enrollment.

title: eBook Platform
description: A modern digital library platform for Helwan University enabling students to access and manage educational content online.
summary: Modern digital library platform for universities with book catalog, online reading interface, bookmarking, recommendation system, multi-format support, offline reading, and social features for enhanced educational resource accessibility.
